views.markdown:
Compatible with the iPhone X (tested on iOS 11.1.2).

NoSwitcherKillBoxX Removes (but doesn't Disable) the Ugly Kill Box on the Switcher of the iPhone X when closing the Applications!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below.

Thanks to my Brother @lorenzo_noide for the Provided Screenshot.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
